mapper.insert: insert into ImportData (quit_pernr, person_scope, direct_pernr, division, originator_pernr, import_time, absenteeism_doc, re_entry) values (#{quitPernr}, #{personScope}, #{directPernr}, #{division}, #{originatorPernr}, #{importTime}, #{absenteeismDoc}, #{reEntry})
mapper.select: select top 1 * from ImportData where quit_pernr = #{quitPernr} order by import_time desc

select a.quit_pernr quitPernr , max(person_scope) personScope , max(direct_pernr) directPernr , max(p1.name) directName , max(b.area_pernr) as areaPernr , max(p3.name) as areaName , max(b.region_pernr) as regionalPernr , max(p2.name) as regionalName , max(division) division , max(originator_pernr) originatorPernr , max(import_time) importTime , max(absenteeism_doc) absenteeismDoc from ImportData a inner join Approve b on a.quit_pernr = b.quit_pernr left join personInfo p1 on p1.alias = a.direct_pernr left join personInfo p2 on p2.alias = b.region_pernr left join personInfo p3 on p3.alias = b.area_pernr where a.quit_pernr = #{quitPernr} group by a.quit_pernr
select * from (select *, row_number() over(partition by quit_pernr order by import_time desc) rows from ImportData) t where t.rows = 1 and t.quit_pernr = #{quitPernr}
select * from (select *, row_number() over(partition by quit_pernr order by import_time desc) rows from ImportData) t where t.rows = 1 and t.originator_pernr = #{ImportPernr}
